prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that looks like a floating pumpkin with spooky facial features.
Imagine a Pokemon resembling a pumpkin with green vines and an eerie smile for Halloween.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of a pumpkin and a ghost, perfect for autumn.
Give me a Halloween-themed Pokemon with a friendly demeanor and a round, orange body.
Generate a small, spooky creature inspired by fall harvests, with a whimsical personality.
Make a ghostly Pokemon featuring a pumpkin shape and a mischievous expression.
Show me a unique Pokemon that embodies the spirit of Halloween with its pumpkin-like appearance.
